post.body: sweet man! post a link once its live :) i'm stoked that u enjoyed the presentation! the ppt notes n related files will b online soon..
cheers man :) @tessneale has been doing some neat seo tweaks on the site, as well as some good promos! the new frameworks helps too :)
lol, you know i want to Les but there is only so much i can squeeze in this time round ;0) hopefully next time :)
the weather in columbus isnt as bad as every1 made it out 2 be :) though still feels like -100 ;) hows it goin with the #cmsexpo vids?
yup :) this trip is limited to denver, boulder, vail, minneapolis, eau claire & columbus but hoping to see more next time round :-)
for sure man! its fun seein all the differerent foods n what not ;) i've gota say this trip has changed my impression of the states! :)
joomla coding caribbean cruise sounds sweet! more info porfavor ;-)
thanks john :) had a great time at the expo and (first time) skiing in vail :-) thanks again for making it all possible!!
really? i've been meaning to go for ages. what didnt u like? the food, the service?
yeah, i gathered as much :) i really love the tight integration between the various core functions of the site! very slick indeed ;-)
that is definitely evident in the end result! again, congrats on an inspiring redesign! we're rolling ours out in bite size chunks ;)
congrats on getting #jquery 1.3b out! downloading now & will kick the tyres a bit later today :)
congrats on the redesign andy! the new site looks awesome! all the content is really nicely laid out and well balanced! big thumbs up!
cheers dude :) it was alot of stuff 2 cover in 3 hours, but it worked out really well :) lookin 4ward 2 the next one in may
thanks @reelclever 2day we came up with some ground breaking stuff for @prothemer & everything is coming together nicely! exciting times! :)
first episode of season 2 flight of the conchords premiering on funnyordie.com tonight!!! http://tinyurl.com/57djjx woooooooooooooooooooo0t!
wowsa that was fast! 10 minutes 2 do a fresh install (including disc format) from external drive! oh & did i mention its sexy? happy stoker!
record sales on @joomlajunkies today & still counting!!! celebrating by upgrading my macbook pro to osx leopard - better late than never ;0)
25 awesome tips on how to improve your jquery coding!!! http://tinyurl.com/5ewof5
thanks to some great getting started tips from @mozami (which will be on @joomlajunkies soon) i'm finally taking the plunge with textmate :)
arrived in columbus, ohio and now having a beer n catching up with @matthewlking :)
walkin around a local supermarket - everything is so different here! processed foods delux & everything supersized! super interesting though
RT @RobLoach Drupal 6.8 and 5.14 released... http://ping.fm/WlrEQ
thanks @ruigato :) i think @tessneale or @pixelprodigy is workin on a post for @joomlajunkies & @prothemer which'll include the interview :)
RT @tessneale The interview with @connectr from the @joomlajunkies team at #CMSexpo in Denver: http://moourl.com/xjchd :)
RT @tessneale New blog post talking about #cmsExpo recently held in Denver http://moourl.com/y5iy5 (Brilliant ending about @connectr! LOL!)
chilling at the atlanta airport, waiting for my flight back home to (hopefully) sunny south africa! cant wait to get back and see everyone!!
had an awesome night last night watching james apollo, now heading out to the mall of america for some more retail therapy :)
back in minneapolis with my cousin alecia and about to hit the town for some live gigs! only 2 days left before heading home to sunny SA :-)
back home after buying some new toys - 160gb apple tv, 16gb red ipod nano & a copy of the transcending css :0) boy its fun spending money!!!
oops! just realized after postin my last tweet that there's an incriminating pic of @matthewlking (@joomlajunkies USA team) on the same page
havin a beer with @matthewlking 2 celebrate our successful forum migration :) this time supersized is good ;0) http://bit.ly/kL0o
RT @jeresig jQuery 1.3 Beta 1 is out - help us test! http://bit.ly/RFIM
new @joomlajunkies forum is live. lots of tweakin 2 do but the base is there & we'll be rollin out loads of new features / refinements soon.
grooving along to the kings of leon whilst working with @matthewlking on rolling out our new forum for @joomlajunkies :-)
160gb apple tv $200 cheaper than in SA! *adds 2 cart* will make a nice addition to our xbox 360 & wii :) quickly runnin out of space though!
doh! plane crash in denver!!! http://tinyurl.com/8kypoz not exactly comforting since i still hav another 5 flights before i get home 2 SA !!
I'm in book heaven!!!! The book loft in Columbus is frikken awesome!! 32 rooms of goodness!!
had a fun night out with @matthewlking & his friends, now heading out to explore columbus, ohio! :)
and compilation of resources mentioned in the presentation can be found here: http://www.box.net/shared/y5nkfsry1u enjoy ;0)
